results.title: Simvastatin protects against T cell immune dysfunction in abdominal sepsis.
results.text_hl: Herein, we hypothesized that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ may attenuate @<m>DISEASE_T_cell_immunodeficiency_primary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536780 @@@T-cell dysfunction@@@ in @DISEASE_Abdominal_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D000007 @@@abdominal sepsis@@@.
